text.more:
Network of tests use in the corpus publications. 
The size of the nodes represent the number of time they appeared in the corpus, their color represents the category of test they belong to.
The more tests are used together, the more thickness and saturation of the edges link the two nodes increases.
Categories :
Green node : Physical tests and tools
Blue node : Questionnaires
Yellow : Cognitive tests and tools
Pink : Physiological tests and tools
Purple : Miscellanious tests and tools
